name: Interval Running
description: Improving speed and endurance through high-intensity interval training (HIIT) techniques.

cards.title: Fartlek Training for Speed & Stamina
cards.description: Incorporating variable-speed intervals to enhance running efficiency.
bulletpoints: Alternate between jogging, moderate running, and sprinting
Improve aerobic and anaerobic conditioning through pace variations
Use landmarks or time-based intervals to structure workouts

cards.title: Hill Sprints for Power & Cardio Conditioning
cards.description: Utilizing inclines to increase leg strength and cardiovascular endurance.
bulletpoints: Sprint uphill at 80-90% maximum effort for short bursts
Recover by walking or jogging downhill
Engage glutes and hamstrings for explosive power
